original_title: Delirious?: Farewell Show - Live in London
overview: Farewell Show - Live In London is a live album by the band Delirious?. In November 2009, Delirious? played at the Hammersmith Apollo in London to record their final gig as a live concert album, DVD and Blu-ray in front of a sold-out crowd of 5,000. With this show they closed their "History Makers - Farewell Tour" which included 11 gigs in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, The Netherlands and the UK.
title: Delirious?: Farewell Show - Live in London
